description: Take your tastebuds on a global trip when you combine stunning winter produce with international flavours. Try this super simple veg-packed traybake this winter.
name: Miso Winter Vegetable Tray Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs mixed white and black sesame seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200C/180C fan-forced. Grease and line a large roasting pan with baking paper. Whisk water, oil and paste in a jug.
Place pumpkin, parsnip sweet potato and broccoli in pan. Drizzle with some oil. Drizzle with half the miso dressing. Roast for 20 minutes.
Add zucchini to pan and drizzle with a little oil. Sprinkle with half of the sesame seeds. Roast for a further 10-15 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Season.
Drizzle with remaining miso dressing. Serve sprinkled with remaining sesame seeds.
